mapper.insert: insert into past(memberIdx, outerIdx, pastFeedback, bottomIdx, topIdx, pastLowTemp, pastHighTemp) values (#{memberIdx}, #{outerIdx}, #{pastFeedback}, #{bottomIdx}, #{topIdx}, #{pastLowTemp}, #{pastHighTemp})
mapper.select: select past.pastIdx as pastIdx, past.pastLowTemp as pastLowTemp, past.pastHighTemp as pastHighTemp, c_top.clothName as cloth_top, c_bottom.clothName as cloth_bottom, ifnull(c_outer.clothName, 'X') as cloth_outer, past.pastFeedback as pastFeedback, past.pastDate as pastDate from past join cloth_top as c_top on past.topIdx = c_top.topIdx join cloth_bottom as c_bottom on past.bottomIdx = c_bottom.bottomIdx left join cloth_outer as c_outer on past.outerIdx = c_outer.outerIdx where past.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} and past.pastDate like '%-${pastDate}-%' order by past.pastIdx desc
